questions.text: What word is written on each hunk of cheese?
questions.explanation:
Fromage.

	The cheeses are giant hunks of Swiss with wedges cut out of each of them.  You can get the best view of the cheese while in the safehouse.  It is here you can most easily read the cheese.

questions.text: According to Carmelita, how tall is Muggshot?
questions.explanation:
Seven Feet Two Inches.

	Carmelita found Muggshot when they were both lured toward each other by Sly and Bentley.  Carmelita gives quite a bit of information about Muggshot, saying he was wanted, and then the fight begins.  Muggshot was in the first "Sly" in Mesa City.

questions.text: According to Carmelita, how much does Muggshot weigh?
questions.explanation:
324 lbs.

	Shortly after giving Muggshot's height, Carmelita gives his weight.  She is very knowledgeable about such a criminal.  When she first saw both Sly AND Muggshot, she was so excited she was able to get both of them at once.  Alas, only Muggshot was captured.

questions.text: Which of the following is a name given by Muggshot to Carmelita?
questions.explanation:
Cop Hag.

	During the video between Carmelita and Muggshot, Muggshot called her a cop hag.  Carmelita didn't appreciate this, as it is rude to call someone cop hag.  Muggshot is offended easily, as he is enraged when his mother is mentioned, and he is also angered when Bentley uses words he doesn't know, like "ear-hole".

questions.text: What, according to Carmelita, is Muggshot also known as?
questions.explanation:
Two-Gun Tony.

	Muggshot is also known as Two-Gun Tony, although his name isn't Tony.  He is obsessed with guns, giving him his name.  Carmelita sure knows a lot about him and Sly!

questions.text: How many windmills are VISIBLE in this level?
questions.explanation:
Eight.

	If you stand on the tallest tower, you are able to see a total of eight windmills.  However, many of these you can not actually climb on.  Once you have destroyed the main windmill, there are only seven.

questions.text: Bentley has to hack computers on top of windmills.  How many vertical bars are on each computer as he hacks them?
questions.explanation:
Six.

	On each computer, there are a total of six bars.  However, the bars vary in amount horizontally, as they constantly move vertically.  When Bentley hacks, you play a little mini-game.  You are in a little ship of some sort, and must get to a green box at the end of the level.  Bentley hacks more computers than those just found in this level, and they get tougher as you go on.

questions.text: What is the name of the final mission in this level?
questions.explanation:
Operation: Turbo Dominant Eagle.

	Although there are operations where you sabotage the two teams, they are not the FINAL operation.  Although they are in the ACE Finals, an operation by that title does not exist.  In the final operation, you learn who the Black Baron truly is.

questions.text: How many years of fisticuff practice did Black Baron say he had?
questions.explanation:
Ten years.

	The Black Baron has many fisticuff attacks.  The most dangerous is when he begins to hover about the plane.  At this point jump and use paraglide to stay on the wing without getting hurt by the attack.  The best time to attack him is when he has just finished a major chop.  Also, watch out for his pig minions.  The pigs throw wrenches, jump and twirl to avoid attacks, and create a fire after oiling the surface in front of them.  This is the most dangerous.

questions.text: Why did Penelope become the Black Baron?
questions.correct: She didn't meet the age requirement
questions.explanation:
She didn't meet the age requirement.

	Penelope was a master flyer, but was too young to enter the competition, so she became the Black Baron.  When she became a member of the team, she finally threw away the costume for good.  She also had one look at Sly and starting having a crush on him.
